actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from DOT, OMB.

official_title: To amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize State and local governments to regulate aviation advertising flights.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize State and local governments to regulate the elevation, flight paths, and timing of aircraft used for advertising which is visible at ground level.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize State and local governments to regulate aviation advertising flights.
